item.title: OpenAI warns that its new ChatGPT Agent has the ability to aid dangerous bioweapon development
item.description: The tool is designed to automate everyday tasks, but safety researchers found the model could also potentially help novices create biological threats

item.title: Mexico City’s Airbnb deal has led years later to ferocious protests against ‘digital nomads’

item.title: Bizarre discovery of 21 children in LA home raises questions about lack of regulations for surrogacy
item.description: Surrogacy has no federal regulation, leaving it up to states, like a child welfare agency's removal of children aged mostly between 1 and 2 from an LA...

item.title: Colbert canceled by CBS days after his withering criticism of parent company’s Trump settlement
item.description: Colbert told his audience Thursday that he just learned “It's the end of ‘The Late Show’ on CBS. I’m not being replaced. This is all just going away.”

item.title: Airport security is poised to finally move on from post-9/11 era but ‘the devil is going to be in the details’
